T02D2242:120b-1: ta th'a ga ta banytsa mu dr'a bi pa ra /
T02D2242:120b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya rnam par bshad pa /
T02D2242:120b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2242:120b-5: rkyen las skyes pa kun rtag stong pa ste //
T02D2242:120b-6: rang bzhin stong pas dngos po yod ma yin //
T02D2242:120b-7: chad min sna tshogs gcig pa'i sems rang bzhin //
T02D2242:120b-8: gzugs sogs rgyal ba lnga ru rgyal gyur cig / phung po lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
T02D2242:120b-9: de la gzhi ni rnam par shes pa tsam du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2242:120b-10: mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D2242:120b-11: de ltar na phyi rol gyi rnam pa ni sems tsam yin pas /
T02D2242:120b-12: gzung ba'i dngos po med la /
T02D2242:120b-14: gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa spangs pa'i don dam
T02D2242:120b-15: pa yod pa mchog tu nyams su myong ba tsam
T02D2242:120b-16: gyis rnam par rig par gnas so ;
T02D2242:120b-17: / de nyid ston ka'i nam mkha' rnam par dag
T02D2242:120b-18: pa'i dkyil ltar rnam pa med par smra bas dngos
T02D2242:120b-19: gzhi rnam par shes par smra bar grub bo //
T02D2242:120b-21: rtag pas stong pa'i rang bzhin ni //
T02D2242:120b-22: snang ba med cing rnam pa med //
T02D2242:120b-23: bden pa rang rig bde ba tsam //
T02D2242:120b-24: rjes thob rnam pa'i tshogs 'khrul pa'o //
T02D2242:120b-26: de yang phyin sa gzugs kyi sku gnyis thob bo zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02D2242:120b-28: spros pa med cing snang ba med //
T02D2242:120b-29: thub pa chen po chos kyi sku //
T02D2242:120b-30: de las gzugs sku gnyis 'byung ba //
T02D2242:120b-31: rjes thob sgyu ma bzhin du gnas //
T02D2242:121a-1: phyag rgya nyid kyis grub pa yin na /
T02D2242:121a-2: 'on ci'i phyir mi bskyod pa la rdo rje sems
T02D2242:121a-3: dpa'i phyag rgyas btab bo zhes gsungs pa'i lung ni
T02D2242:121a-4: ji srid du rtogs pa'i rnam pas stong par byed
T02D2242:121a-5: de zhe na / ma yin te dang po phyag rgya nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2242:121a-6: de bas na mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya ye shes
T02D2242:121a-7: kyi dngos gzhi rang rig las rjes thob gzhan yin
T02D2242:121a-8: la / de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya rnam par shes pa ni rjes thob ste /
T02D2242:121a-9: rdo rje ni dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D2242:121a-10: rdo rje rtse mo las kyang gsungs pa /
T02D2242:121a-11: snying po brtan zhing khong stong med //
T02D2242:121a-12: mi chod mi phyed mtshan nyid de //
T02D2242:121a-13: mi shigs pa dang mi nyams dang //
T02D2242:121a-14: stong nyid rdo rje zhes brjod do //
T02D2242:121a-16: dngos gzhi ye shes mi bskyod rgyas //
T02D2242:121a-17: gzugs sogs rjes thob yin na ni //
T02D2242:121a-18: de ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis //
T02D2242:121a-19: rjes thob sems dpa' cis mi 'thob //
T02D2242:121a-20: 'o na snying rje dngos med pa'i //
T02D2242:121a-21: chad par smra ba thal bar 'gyur //
T02D2242:121a-23: rdo rje stong pa nyid du brjod //
T02D2242:121a-24: sems dpa' ye shes tsam nyid de //
T02D2242:121a-25: de dag bdag nyid grub pa 'dis //
T02D2242:121a-26: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2242:121a-27: stong nyid snying rje dbye ba ni //
T02D2242:121a-28: mar me dang ni snang ba bzhin //
T02D2242:121a-29: stong nyid snying rje gcig pa yang /
T02D2242:121a-30: mar me snang ba ji bzhin no //
T02D2242:121a-31: dngos nyid stong nyid gzhan med de //
T02D2242:121a-32: de dang bral na dngos yod min //
T02D2242:121a-33: mi phyed dngos po nges pa ste //
T02D2242:121a-34: byas pa ni rtag pa bzhin no //
T02D2242:121a-35: med na mi 'byung nges phyir ro //
T02D2242:121a-36: ji ltar de nyid ston pa la //
T02D2242:121a-37: ma chad pa nyid kun rdzob ste //
T02D2242:121a-38: kun rdzob dang ni bral ba la //
T02D2242:121a-39: de kho na nyid dmigs med 'gyur /
T02D2242:121a-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so//
T02D2242:121a-41: de ltar na mi bskyod pa dang //
T02D2242:121a-42: rdo rje sems dpa' gcig par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D2242:121a-43: 'o na ni rnam par shes pas gzugs la sogs pa yongs su ma btang bas /
T02D2242:121a-44: sna tshogs gnyis su med pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
T02D2242:121a-46: sna tshogs dang bcas sems tsam ma lus rtogs pa yis //
T02D2242:121a-47: stong pa'i dngos po rnam bcas pa yi gzhung gis 'dod //
T02D2242:121a-48: 'gro tshe rtsva la reg pa bzhin du mnyam pa ste //
T02D2242:121a-49: dbu ma'i don du skyes bus rab tu smra pa'o //
T02D2242:121a-50: sna tshogs gnyis su med par smra ba yang //
T02D2242:121a-51: don dam pa yi bden pa zhes zer te //
T02D2242:121a-52: rnam par shes pa yod par 'dod pas mdzes pa ma yin no //
T02D2242:121b-0: gzung ba dang 'dzin @121b pas stong pa sna tshogs
T02D2242:121b-1: gnyis su med pa nyid mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2242:121b-3: rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pas dngos po'i bden pa gsal to //
T02D2242:121b-5: gzugs sogs rtogs pas stong pa yi //
T02D2242:121b-6: ye shes mi bskyod phyag rgya la //
T02D2242:121b-7: der ni rdor sems rgyas btab pas //
T02D2242:121b-8: dngos po yod pa bkag pa yin //
T02D2242:121b-9: rnam par rig pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2242:121b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' mi bya ste //
T02D2242:121b-11: dang po nyid nas mi gnas pas //
T02D2242:121b-12: rtag pa thams cad stong pa nyid //
T02D2242:121b-13: de ltar na don dam pa yod pa'i zug rngu spangs pa ste /
T02D2242:121b-14: thams cad du mi gnas pa'i rang bzhin /
T02D2242:121b-15: lhun gyis grub pa'i zung du 'jug pa gnyis su med pa'i rgyu rang rig par grub pa ni /
T02D2242:121b-16: dbu ma'i grub pa'i mtha' phul du phyung ba'o //
T02D2242:121b-17: 'di yang bla ma dam pa'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin las rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2242:121b-18: ci ste zhes rang rig pas grub na ni sgyu
T02D2242:121b-19: ma lta bu gnyis su med par smra bar thal
T02D2242:121b-20: bar 'gyur te / thams cad du rab tu mi gnas pas ni ma yin no zhe na /
T02D2242:121b-23: de yi rang ma skyes pas //
T02D2242:121b-24: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes gang /
T02D2242:121b-25: de la skye zhes ji ltar bya //
T02D2242:121b-30: nyams su myong ba mi gnas pas //
T02D2242:121b-31: ma skyes pa yi go 'phang ngo//
T02D2242:121b-33: nyams su myong ba ma skyes pa //
T02D2242:121b-34: dngos po yod pa 'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2242:121b-35: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du //
T02D2242:121b-36: 'gro ba nyid ni thub pas gsungs //
T02D2242:121b-37: yang 'di ltar 'jam dpal la de bzhin gshegs pas dris pa /
T02D2242:121b-38: 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin /
T02D2242:121b-40: khams gang bsam du med pa'i sems de brjod du med pa dang /
T02D2242:121b-41: sems kyi gzhal bya ba ma yin pa dang /
T02D2242:121b-42: sems kyi sems pa med pa /
T02D2242:121b-43: rab tu bsam par bya ste /
T02D2242:121b-44: 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o //
T02D2242:121b-45: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das sems nyid bsam gyis ni khyab pa'i dbyings so ;
T02D2242:121b-47: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings pa sems yod pa ma yin te /
T02D2242:121b-48: gang gi phyir sems ni bsam du med la /
T02D2242:121b-49: don ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i sems so //
T02D2242:121b-50: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings so //
T02D2242:122a-2: rab tu mi gnas pa yi yid //
T02D2242:122a-3: dran pa med cing yid byed med //
T02D2242:122a-6: zla ba sgron ma las kyang /
T02D2242:122a-7: gang zhig rkyen las skyes pa de ma skyas //
T02D2242:122a-8: de la skya ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin //
T02D2242:122a-9: rkyen las rag las gang de stong pa yin //
T02D2242:122a-10: gang zhig stong nyid shes te bag yod min //
T02D2242:122a-11: zhes pa dang 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las kyang /
T02D2242:122a-12: gang phyir 'khrul pa kun spangs nas //
T02D2242:122a-13: gal te mtshan ma skyes na ni //
T02D2242:122a-15: rab rib ma dag pa bzhin no //
T02D2242:122a-18: rnam rigs la gnas ma gyur cig / de phyir 'jigs las thub pa yis //
T02D2242:122a-19: chos rnams phye ste bstan pa ni //
T02D2242:122a-20: stong pa nyid du yang dag bstan //
T02D2242:122a-22: dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang //
T02D2242:122a-23: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa //
T02D2242:122a-24: bden pa ma yin brdzun pa min //
T02D2242:122a-27: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bzhag nas su //
T02D2242:122a-28: blo ldan phra bas lta ba'i grub pa'i mtha' //
T02D2242:122a-29: sangs rgyas pa dang phyi rol dbye ba byas //
T02D2242:122a-30: gang tshe 'dir gcig stong pa nyid du brjod /
T02D2242:122a-31: 'di dag gis ni stong pa nyid //
T02D2242:122a-32: chad pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2242:122a-33: gang mthong de ni de bzhin nyid //
T02D2242:122a-34: dbu ma'i don gyi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D2242:122a-35: de nyid rig pa de nor ldan //
T02D2242:122a-36: gang tshe mngon sum rtogs pa'o //
T02D2242:122a-37: mkha' 'gro ba dra ba'i sdom pa las kyang /
T02D2242:122a-38: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D2242:122a-39: sems gang gis ni rtogs gyur na //
T02D2242:122a-40: gang phyir de sangs rgyas dang chos //
T02D2242:122a-43: de'i phyir ni phung po lnga ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste /
T02D2242:122a-44: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir //
T02D2242:122a-45: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba dang snying rje dbyer med pas 'gro ba rnams stong pa dang /
T02D2242:122a-46: snying rje dbyer med par gnas so //
T02D2242:122a-47: de dag nyid bla ma'i man ngag gis rgyun mi 'chad par bsam gtan bya ste /
T02D2242:122a-48: chu rlabs 'bab pa'i gzhung dang ni //
T02D2242:122a-49: mar me 'bar ba'i rgyun bzhin du //
T02D2242:122a-50: sngags kyi de nyid rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D2242:122a-51: rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bsam gtan thob //
T02D2242:122a-52: de bzhin du klu sgrub snying po'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa /
T02D2242:122b-0: 'di ni @122b gzhal yas khang min yul min dbang po min te 'byung ba la sogs min //
T02D2242:122b-1: gzugs la sogs pa ma yin srog chags min zhing mi min 'di dag rgyal ba'o //
T02D2242:122b-2: 'khor lo'i gtso bo 'di ni chos nyid yin te des na dkyil 'khor pa yin la //
T02D2242:122b-3: khams gsum 'di dag sna tshogs 'khor lor shes na sems ni ci ste 'khrul bar byed //
T02D2242:122b-5: rkyen las byung ba'i lha rnams ni dri za'i grong khyer lta bur gsal ba /
T02D2242:122b-6: spros pa sna tshogs rang bzhin gyis gnas pa med de //
T02D2242:122b-7: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du gtan med pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2242:122b-8: de yang dgyes pa'i rdo rje las gsungs pa /
T02D2242:122b-10: gti mug las ni 'khor ba'i chos //
T02D2242:122b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya rnam par bshad pa /
T02D2242:122b-13: slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2242:122b-15: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po phyag na rdo rje dang /
